text: Akave, ninkal iman kolvataippol avarkalum iman kontal niccayamaka avarkal nervaliyai perruvituvarkal;. Anal avarkal purakkanittuvittal niccayamaka avarkal pilaviltan irukkinranar. Enave avarkali(n ketutalkali)liruntu um'maik kapparra allahve potumanavan;. Avan (yavarraiyum) ceviyuruvonakavum, (ellam) arintonumakavum irukkiran
